text: Hini na nina bakholwayo! Musani ukuba njengabangakholwayo, abathi kubazalwana babo xa beseluhambeni, (becanda amathafa) okanye besiya kulwa: “Ukuba bebethe bahlala nathi, ngebengafanga okanye babulawe,” ukuze uAllâh Enze oko kungunobangela wokuzisola ezintliziyweni zabo. NguAllâh Onika ubomi, Adale ukufa, kananjalo uAllâh Ukubona konke oko nikwenzayo
